A B C D E G I M N P R S T U V W

I

IActuator - Interface in domain
This interface defines all the methods that an actuator must implements: 1 - public boolean setValue(int value): set up a value on the actuator.
IComunicator - Interface in comunication
This interface define all methods for IComunicator.
IDevice - Interface in domain
This interface defines all methods that a device must implements: 1 - public String getName(): returns the name of the device. 2 - public int getPin(): returns the number of the pin. 3 - public boolean is digital(): returns true if the device is digital.
IPushNotification - Interface in comunication
This interface defines all methods for a device that manages PUSH notification.
isDigital() - Method in class domain.Actuator
Returns true if the actuator is digital.
isDigital() - Method in interface domain.IDevice
Returns a flag that indicates if the device is digital or not.
isDigital() - Method in class domain.Sensor
Returns true if the device is digital.
ISensor - Interface in domain
This interface define all the method that a Sensor must implements: 1 - public int getValue() has to return the value of the current state of the sensor.
isPushNotificatoinEnabled() - Method in interface comunication.IPushNotification
Says if push notifications are enabled for current sensor.
isPushNotificatoinEnabled() - Method in class domain.Sensor
Return true if push notification are enabled.
